name: Gen.Z Cultivation
description:
STORY

In the 21st century, the gods came into the world. They are actually a group of aliens, but they are proclaimed as gods by believers. They keep humans in captivity and destroy the world. As a disciple of a cultivator, you want to save the world and overthrow the rule of God.

DESCRIPTION

The game highlights the casual combat experience. Players will play the role of a cultivator in the Z generation, and achieve immortality by quickly killing monsters and upgrading. The game focuses on the combat experience, pays attention to the construction of short- and medium-term goals, and uses the roguelike three-choice upgrade method to promote player growth. The duration of a single game is five minutes + challenge mode. The game focuses on asynchronous social gameplay. Players need to cultivate combat power bonus pets for outside development. At the same time, the design similar to the world boss in the challenge mode also promotes the help cycle between players.

TEASER TRAILER

GAMEPLAY WALKTHROUGH

CREDITS

Qian Cheng - Producer

Yibo Wang - Designer

Yunfeng Ma - Designer

Gang Zuo - Designer

Fei Yang - Programmer

Yinan Gu - Programmer

Muhan Yu - 2D Artist

Yue Zhao - Technical Artist

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS
  • Download the .apk folder
  • Install the .apk folder in Android platform
